    • addUser

      public void addUser(String username, String email, String password) throws ValidationException, RepositoryException, ServiceException
      Adds a new user.
      Parameters:
      username - - the username of the user
      email - - the email of the user
      password - - the password of the user
      Throws:
      ValidationException - if the username is too short if the email is invalid if the password is too short
      RepositoryException - if the saving operation fails
      ServiceException - if the user already exists

    • findUserById

      public User findUserById(int id)
      Finds a user by id.
      Parameters:
      id - - the id of the user that is being looked for
      Returns:
      the user, if found null, otherwise

    • updateUser

      public void updateUser(int id, String newUsername, String newEmail, int newPasswordCode, String newSalt, UserRank newRank, int newTokenCount) throws RepositoryException
      Updates a user.
      Parameters:
      id - - the id of the user to be updated
      newUsername - - the new username
      newEmail - - the new email
      newPasswordCode - - the new password code
      newSalt - - the new salt
      newRank - - the new rank
      newTokenCount - - the new token count
      Throws:
      RepositoryException - if the update operation fails

    • checkPassword

      public boolean checkPassword(String username, String password)
      Checks if a password matches to the one of the user.
      Parameters:
      username - - the username of the user whose password is being checked
      password - - the password to be checked
      Returns:
      true, if the password matches the user's password false, otherwise
